isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - TRANSMISSION (MANUAL); REMOVE AND REINSTALL

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood.
Raise front axle assembly and place blocks under tire.
Drain air tanks and close valves.
Disconnect safety belts from floor and seat. Disconnect air line and remove right seat assembly.
Remove right sill plate and kick panel.
Reposition cab floor mat to gain access to transmission access plate.
Remove cab floor pan.
Place transmission into gear.
Disconnect transmission wiring necessary to remove transmission and mark wiring as needed.
Disconnect clutch pedal linkage from transmission.
Remove air/solenoid valve pack from rear of cab mount with bracket attached. Include disconnect wiring and air lines as needed.
Remove both fuel tank support cross over brackets (from tank to battery box).
Remove drive shaft from transmission and support second section.
Disconnect transmission air lines necessary to remove transmission.
Remove lower clutch housing inspection cover. Include remove washer from grease tube.
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines to transmission and cap ends.
Remove bolts retaining transmission to engine, except two.
Secure jack to transmission assembly.
Remove remaining bolts and remove transmission assembly.
Remove transmission assembly from under vehicle.
Check clutch assembly alignment with dummy shaft.
Install transmission assembly under vehicle.
Install manual transmission assembly.
Install all bolts retaining transmission to engine and remove jack.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines and air lines to transmission.
Connect clutch pedal linkage to transmission.
Check clutch assembly adjustment.
Install lower clutch housing inspection cover. Include install washer to grease tube.
Install both fuel tank support cross over brackets (from tank to battery box).
Connect transmission wiring to transmission. Include install plastic ties as needed.
Install drive shaft to transmission.
Install air/solenoid valve pack to rear of cab mount with bracket attached. Connect wiring and air lines as required.
Install cab floor pan.
Place cab floor mat to original position.
Install right kick panel and sill plate.
Install seat assembly and connect air line. Connect safety belt to floor and seat.
Lower front axle assembly and remove blocks from under tires.
Fill air tanks and check for leaks.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
